work.title: Design and Graphics Intern
work.desc: Collaborated with designers and graphics reporters to design and develop web presentations of enterprise projects. Built bespoke storytelling tools and components for the Post's website. Created interactive graphics for data-driven politics stories.

work.title: Design and Graphics Intern
work.desc: Collaborated with designers and graphics reporters to design and develop web presentations of enterprise projects. Built bespoke storytelling tools and components for the Post's website. Created interactive graphics for data-driven politics stories.

work.title: Fellow, Data Reporter
work.desc: Ran advanced data analyses in R and Python to develop promising leads and story ideas. Filed public records requests to gather data. Designed and built interactive graphics to supplement storytelling.

work.title: Data and Graphics Reporter
work.desc: Designed graphics and programmed interactive maps and visualizations. Built Python web scrapers to automate data collection. Created news apps and long-form web presentations to present data-driven stories in engaging and visual ways.

work.title: Data Graphics Intern
work.desc: Pitched, reported and wrote data-driven stories. Analyzed data sets to develop story ideas. Built engaging charts, maps and graphics for stories to explain the news visually.

work.title: Graduate Assistant
work.desc: Identified, reported and wrote stories in innovative and narrative styles for Maryland Today, the university’s daily information website. Contributed news stories and feature profiles to Terp, a tri-annual, award-winning alumni magazine.

work.title: Managing Digital Editor
work.desc: Led a team of 10 digital producers to monitor a website with a daily audience of 5,000 visitors, managed social media platforms to increase Facebook engagement by 21 percent and Twitter engagement by 10 percent. Redesigned the DI’s website, and pushed for a digital-first mindset in the newsroom.

work.org: UI School of Journalism and Mass Comm.
work.title: Student Ambassador
work.desc: Conducted tours of the journalism school and talk to prospective students about studying journalism. Redesigned the Iowa Summer Journalism Workshop website.
